name: snow_depth_data
description: Collects Snow Depth and Snow Fall data based on the user's question.

user_question.description: How much new snow has fallen in the last 24 hours in Eagle County?

name: get_query_hunting
description: Generates a SQL query for hunting related data based on the user's question.

user_question.description: What was the archery elk success rate for GMU 49?

name: weather_forecast
description: Returns the 3-day weather forecast for a given location.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location in decimal degrees.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location in decimal degrees.
